message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its exceptional features and craftsmanship, I'm extending this exclusive offer for you at a special price of $95. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, but I'm looking to spend no more than $80. Would you be willing to come down to that price?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. To accommodate your needs while still providing you with a valuable product, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $85. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $85 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm happy to meet you halfway at $82.50. Let's close this deal!
